TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HealthVaultPlatformAlternateId extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides low-level access to the HealthVault alternate id operations.
Docs.remarks: uses this class to perform operations. Set HealthVaultPlatformAlternateId.Current to a derived class to intercept all message calls.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
public virtual void AssociateAlternateId (Microsoft.Health.ApplicationConnection connection, Microsoft.Health.HealthRecordAccessor accessor, string alternateId);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AssociateAlternateId(class Microsoft.Health.ApplicationConnection connection, class Microsoft.Health.HealthRecordAccessor accessor, string alternateId) cil managed

Docs.param: The connection to use to access the data.
Docs.summary: Associates an alternate ID with a record.
Docs.remarks: This method accesses the HealthVault service across the network.
Docs.exception: The connection, accessor, or alternateId parameters are null
The alternateId parameter is empty, all whitespace, or more than 255 characters in length.

The HealthVault service returned an error. If the alternate ID is already associated by this application, the ErrorCode property will be set to DuplicateAlternateId. If the number of alternate IDs associated with a record exceeds the limit, the ErrorCode property will be set to AlternateIdsLimitExceeded.

Docs.summary: Removes mocking of calls to this class.
Docs.exception: There is no mock registered for this class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void DisassociateAlternateId (Microsoft.Health.ApplicationConnection connection, string alternateId);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DisassociateAlternateId(class Microsoft.Health.ApplicationConnection connection, string alternateId) cil managed

Docs.param: The connection to use to access the data.
Docs.summary: Disassociates an alternate ID with a record.
Docs.remarks: This method accesses the HealthVault service across the network.
Docs.exception: The connection, or alternateId parameters are null.
The alternateId parameter is empty, all whitespace, or more than 255 characters in length.
The HealthVault service returned an error. If the alternate Id is not associated with a person and record id, the ErrorCode property will be set to AlternateIdNotFound.

Docs.param: The connection to use to access the data.
Docs.summary: Gets the list of alternate IDs that are associated with a record.
Docs.remarks: This method accesses the HealthVault service across the network.
Docs.exception: The HealthVault service returned an error. If the alternate Id is not associated with a person and record id, the ErrorCode property will be set to AlternateIdNotFound.
